title: Mercury Transit in the 10th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 10th house for Scorpio Ascendant, intellect and communication directly influence career, reputation, and authority. Decision-making becomes sharp in professional matters, and success depends on clarity of speech, planning, and strategy. Discussions with seniors, clients, or the public increase. This phase favors presentations, negotiations, and management roles. However, overthinking or excessive talking can weaken authority. When used consciously, this transit strengthens professional intelligence, career growth, and a credible public image.

sections.title: Reputation & Image
points: Talking too much can dilute impact
